text: `useMemo` will work. `useNavigate` will not as react router is not supported

Many thanks <@U04EJHVD8FM> 

Do you know if there somewhere one can see all possible hooks that are supported?

We don't have a definitive list. Please refer to the "Limitations" section of our docs. Anything that uses the DOM / window won't work. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-overview#limitations>
Hey <@U049YGVBGBC>, is this a developer sandbox account? If so, you can’t activate betas unfortunately even though the sandbox has “Sales Enterprise”
